entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1200 metres near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
